title: Four Men
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Charles Denby
provenance_text:
Robert Beauchamp [1923-1995], New York, NY; Charles Denby [1901-1982], Sewickley, PA, by December 1958 [1]; Mr. and Mrs. Charles Denby (Rosamond Reed Denby) [1906-1988], Sewickley, PA, until December 17, 1970 [2]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1970.

Notes:
[1]. Charles Denby lent the painting (no. 36) to "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1958 - February 1959.  
[2]. Mr. and Mrs. Charles Denby lent the painting to the exhibition "Art Since 1900 - Privately Owned in the Pittsburgh Area" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, January - February 1963.

creator.death_place: New York City (New York State, United States)
